recipe:
Cherry Tomatoe Bake
4 cups cherry tomatoes halved 3 cloves garlic minced 2 TBsp olive oil 1/4 teaspoon SandP 1/2 cup feta crumbled 1 bunch dill chopped
Preheat oven to 180C while preparing the ingredients. In shallow baking dish place all ingredients. Cook for 30-40 mins. When tomatoes have all collapsed remove from oven. Stir and sprinkle with additional dill if desired. Serve with BBQ meat.
* different variety tomatoes can be used, I prefer 2 red and 1 yellow punnet
